title: More Crypto IPOs Are Coming: 3 Initial Public Offerings To Watch For
description: Circle just got a warm welcome to Wall Street. Here are 3 more crypto companies eyeing Initial Public Offerings in the coming months: Gemini, Kraken, and Bitgo
